Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs and elevate your experience. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your life or business. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your world. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
